# MDB_Quiz_App

## Question-Bank Document Shape

This is a Practice app where people who are preparing for the MongoDB Associate Python developer Exam can come and practice for the exam 

The quiz app stores each question (QA pair) as a single document in the **`questions`** collection:

```
{
  "_id": "<auto-generated or sequential ID>",

  /* — CLASSIFICATION — */
  "topic": "CRUD | Indexing | Aggregation | Data Modeling | MongoDB Overview & Document Model | Query Operators | Security | Atlas | Performance Tuning",
  "subtopic": "Short, specific concept (e.g., 'Compound Indexes', '$in Operator', 'Null vs Missing Fields')",
  "difficulty": "Beginner | Intermediate | Advanced",

  /* — QUESTION BODY — */
  "type": "single | multi | true_false | code",
  "stem": "The actual question text, ideally in one or two sentences.",

  /* (Optional — if example context is needed) */
  "sample_docs": [
    { "_id": 1, "example": "..." }
  ],
  "index": { "city": 1, "name": 1 },
  "operation": {
    "command": "db.collection.updateOne",
    "filter": { "_id": 1 },
    "update": { "$set": { "field": "value" } }
  },

  /* — OPTIONS — */
  "options": [
    { "key": "A", "text": "Option text (string or small JSON if needed)" },
    { "key": "B", "text": "..." },
    { "key": "C", "text": "..." },
    { "key": "D", "text": "..." }
  ],

  /* — ANSWER & EXPLANATION — */
  "answers": ["A"],

  "explanation": {
    "why_correct": [
      "Detailed reason why the correct answer is right, with clear keywords."
    ],
    "why_incorrect": [
      "Short, clear explanations why each distractor is wrong."
    ],
    "mini_examples": [
      "Small working code example or shell command that reinforces understanding."
    ],
    "takeaway": "1-line memory hook or principle (e.g., 'Embed small, reference large')."
  },

  /* — META INFO — */
  "version": 1,
  "status": "active | draft | retired",
  "author": "prashanth",
  "created_at": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ",
  "updated_at": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ"
}
```

1. make updates to the code for exam preparation
